author: mikedd
msg: OPENJPA-1995: detect mixed parameter types in JPQL query

author: tomaz
msg: Fix a bug with primary IP address handling in the Slicehost driver. Slicehost
API sometimes returns internal IP as a primary address and we added this IP to
the public_ip instead of private_ip list.

author: johnh
msg: Several gadgets.rpc fixes and improvements discovered when removing insecure rpc communication (effectively setting forcesecure=true always).
1. Fix auto-detected rpctoken of child URL, accidentally broken in a previous
2. Remove relayURL requirement for wpm to work. How this ever worked I'm not
sure -- perhaps because forcesecure wasn't enabled before. WPM's same-origin
policy does not require a relay IFRAME to work properly. This CL removes
relayOnload() in the transport for this case, while keeping it for the phishing
3. Retrieve the appropriate target origin when verifying w.pm messages.

author: tomaz
msg: oops, also need pass timeout to the parent class here.
